docs.snippet: In addition to those mentioned in last night's dispatch as addressing the Breckinridge meeting, were Senators BEOWS and DAVIS, and Representative FLOZENCE.

headline.main: GENERAL TELEGRAPHIC NEWS,; The Breckinridge and Lane Meeting in Washington. SPEECHES BY THE PRESIDENT AND SECRETARY COBB.

docs.lead_paragraph: In addition to those mentioned in last night's dispatch as addressing the Breckinridge meeting, were Senators BEOWS and DAVIS, and Representative FLOZENCE.

docs.snippet: The steamship Karnak arrived at this port last night, from Havana on the 4th and Nassau, N.P., on the 6th inst.
docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Karnak arrived at this port last night, from Havana on the 4th and Nassau, N.P., on the 6th inst.

docs.snippet: You hardly need to be told what is the subject about which the Germans are now talking with their usual volubility, and more than their usual ignorance. For the last fortnight the meeting of Sovereigns at Baden Baden has taken the wind out of every...

headline.main: AFFAIRS IN GERMANY.; The Baden Conference of Sovereigns--Comments of the London Times and the German Press--Miscellaneous Political Movements.

docs.lead_paragraph: You hardly need to be told what is the subject about which the Germans are now talking with their usual volubility, and more than their usual ignorance. For the last fortnight the meeting of Sovereigns at Baden Baden has taken the wind out of every other political sail.

headline.main: NATIONAL POLITICS.; Political Movements at the Capital--The Bell and Everett Ticket--Prospects of the Democracy--The Breckinridge Ticket.
The Seventh Regiment in Camp.; THE RUSH OF VISITORS--DE LAVE'S ROPE-WALKING--THE REVIEW, ETC.

docs.snippet: Ere the excitement incident to the recent murders of Messrs. WALTON and MATHEWS has in the least degree subsided, we are called upon to give the particulars of another fearful tragedy, which more than parallels the first crime in features of...

headline.main: ANOTHER TERRIBLE CRIME.; A Woman Nearly Beaten to Death With a Hammer and her Child Killed-- Her Recovery Impossible. ARREST OF THE ASSASSIN.

docs.lead_paragraph: Ere the excitement incident to the recent murders of Messrs. WALTON and MATHEWS has in the least degree subsided, we are called upon to give the particulars of another fearful tragedy, which more than parallels the first crime in features of atrocity.

docs.snippet: Mr. John M. Price, a house-builder living in Richmond, is missing from home. When last seen he had between $150 and $300 in money on his person.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. John M. Price, a house-builder living in Richmond, is missing from home. When last seen he had between $150 and $300 in money on his person.

docs.snippet: A wrong impression has been spread throughout the country concerning the extent and prevalence of the cattle distemper in Massachusetts. True, there has been a panic, but it arose from what was feared rather than from what was known and seen.

headline.main: THE CATTLE DISEASE.; Succinct History of the Rise, Progress and Decline of the Cattle Distemper in Massachusetts.

docs.lead_paragraph: A wrong impression has been spread throughout the country concerning the extent and prevalence of the cattle distemper in Massachusetts. True, there has been a panic, but it arose from what was feared rather than from what was known and seen.

docs.snippet: The Beirut, Syria, correspondent of the Boston Traveller, writing on the 6th ult., says:

headline.main: Interesting from Syria.; A FIERCE CIVIL WAR RAGING VILLAGES BURNED AND WOMEN AND CHILDREN BUTCHERED SAFETY OF THE AMERICAN MISSIONARIES.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Beirut, Syria, correspondent of the Boston Traveller, writing on the 6th ult., says:
